name: The Passing (Sxm.vd)
description:
The Passing is an early prototype for a 2D Metroidvania-style platformer. The game is heavily inspired by the likes of Castlevania, Metroid, Hollow Knight, Shovel Knights, and a number of other 2D platformers.

The Game has the player take on the role of a spirit trapped in the underworld who must traverse their way through the dangers to escape and pass on to the next life. 

The Passing was produced by a team of four students: Samad, Rosie, Taha, and Michael.

Although this is only an early prototype we appreciate all feedback.
